thread.title: Julia Louis Dreyfus, Mahershala Ali, and Stranger Things’ David Harbour Call out Trump in SAG Awards Speeches - But Winona Ryder's face says it all.
thread.title_full: Julia Louis Dreyfus, Mahershala Ali, and Stranger Things’ David Harbour Call out Trump in SAG Awards Speeches - But Winona Ryder's face says it all.

author: Dan Van Winkle
title: Julia Louis Dreyfus, Mahershala Ali, and Stranger Things’ David Harbour Call out Trump in SAG Awards Speeches - But Winona Ryder's face says it all.
text:
Vid: @OfficialJLD (Julia Louis-Dreyfus), to applause, at #SAGAwards live on TNT: “Immigrant ban is un-American” #TTT pic.twitter.com/8vJ4Z62igd 
— Brent Baker (@BrentHBaker) January 30, 2017 
Those darn Hollywood elites got together again tonight for the Screen Actors Guild awards, and as usual, some of our favorite stars had some moving words on what’s happening in our country right now—particularly in light of Donald Trump’s ill-conceived and openly discriminatory (no matter who denies it) executive order on travel, immigration, and refugees.
Watch Mahershala Ali’s incredible speech from the Sag Awards. It’s amazing to see how far he’s come. #Sagawards pic.twitter.com/ZnjnHPy7kV 
— Geeks of Color (@GeeksOfColor) January 30, 2017 

As a bonus, check out #WinonaRyder on Twitter for GIFs of her classic reaction shots to Harbour’s speech. Those are sure to get a lot of use in the near future.
Literally every facial expression I make in a day #SAGAwards #WinonaRyder pic.twitter.com/SwWkAUxiEx 
— Natasha Del Riego (@natashaaa__) January 30, 2017 
(image via screengrab)
